examples.description: Given the pre-generated 2021 company using Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And the company has CIS enabled -> Given a sent GBP invoice to John Bull dated on 2020-01-01 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the invoice is set at 20% -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £100.00 + 20% VAT -> And a CIS line item is added for £300 with 20% VAT -> Given a sent credit note to John Bull dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £200.00 + 20% VAT -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for £240.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
examples.full_description: Credit note reconcillation Invoice contains CIS line items, credit note does not Given the pre-generated 2021 company using Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And the company has CIS enabled -> Given a sent GBP invoice to John Bull dated on 2020-01-01 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the invoice is set at 20% -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £100.00 + 20% VAT -> And a CIS line item is added for £300 with 20% VAT -> Given a sent credit note to John Bull dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £200.00 + 20% VAT -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for £240.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be

examples.description: Given the pre-generated 2021 company using Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And the company has CIS enabled -> Given a sent GBP invoice to John Bull dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £200.00 + 20% VAT -> Given a sent credit note to John Bull dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the credit note is set at 20% -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £100.00 + 20% VAT -> And a CIS line item is added to the credit note for £300 with 20% VAT -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for £240.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
examples.full_description: Credit note reconcillation Invoice does not contain CIS line items, credit note does Given the pre-generated 2021 company using Invoice accounting for VAT, not on the FRS -> And the company has CIS enabled -> Given a sent GBP invoice to John Bull dated on 2020-01-01 -> And it has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £200.00 + 20% VAT -> Given a sent credit note to John Bull dated on 2020-02-01 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the credit note is set at 20% -> And the credit note has a line for 1 Hour of Awesomeness @ £100.00 + 20% VAT -> And a CIS line item is added to the credit note for £300 with 20% VAT -> And a credit note reconciliation is created for £240.00 -> Then the credit note reconciliation should have ledger entries -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the invoice will be -> And the Accrual Ledger Entries on the credit note will be
